item.title: Jenkins 2.200
item.description:
• Major RFE: Add an option for a Resource Root URL through which Jenkins will serve user-generated static resources like workspace files or archived artifacts without the need for Content-Security-Policy headers.
  • Major RFE: Remove the ability to download update center metadata using the user's browser (deprecated since 2015). Jenkins will no longer inform about available updates without a connection to update sites. We recommend the use of a local mirror of our update sites, or a self-hosted update center like Juseppe in these situations.
  • Bug: Fix style of administrative monitors showing informational messages in the popup.
  • Bug: Add a missing "pressed" style for the Create Item button.
  • Bug: Fix labels to Atom feed links.
  • RFE: Developer: Add Functions#urlEncode(String) to ease encoding of URL query parameters from Jelly views.
  • RFE: Developer: TarOutputStream is now marked restricted so it is not used from plugins.
  • RFE: Internal: Various code cleanups.

item.title: Jenkins 2.199
item.description:
• Major RFE: Prevent calls to Jenkins#save persisting data before we have finished loading the in-memory model. This prevents possible corruption of the main Jenkins configuration.
  • Bug: Increase client-side keep-alive ping frequency on the HTTP-based CLI to prevent timeouts.
  • RFE: Reduce default soft-kill timeout from two minutes to five seconds so that builds that spawned other processes can finish more quickly.
  • RFE: Stop bundling Maven Plugin and Subversion Plugin with Jenkins. In very rare cases, this could result in problems when attempting to install plugins compatible with Jenkins before 1.310. The Jenkins project is currently not publishing any such plugins.
  • RFE: Remove plugins bundled only to promote their use, as they are not needed for compatibility with old plugins. Since Jenkins 2.0, the concept of plugins installed by default is replaced with the setup wizard.
  • RFE: Update bundled version of Script Security Plugin to 1.65.
  • Bug: Developer: ProcessTree#killAll no longer fails with NPE if proc argument is null.
  • Bug: Internal: hudson.util.ProcessTree.OSProcess#getEnvironmentVariables returned null when an error occurred even though it shouldn't.

item.title: Jenkins 2.198
item.description:
• RFE: Remove 100 character length limitation of build description in build history widget.
  • RFE: Update the minimum required Remoting client version to 3.14 to simplify the implementation.
  • RFE: Use different computer icon for temporary offline state.
  • RFE: Robustness: Do not allow users to resubmit requests using POST on URLs requiring a form submission, as that will fail anyway.
  • RFE: Better diagnostics in a failure message from Computer.getLogDir.
  • RFE: Update bundled versions of Ant, PAM Authentication, Mailer, and Script Security plugins for the rare cases they're installed from bundled versions.
  • RFE: Update commons-compress from 1.10 to 1.19.
  • RFE: Update jfreechart from 1.0.9 to 1.0.19 to pick-up recent improvements and bugfixes.
  • Bug: The lastCompletedBuild permalink was not being cached in the ‚Ä¶/builds/permalinks file.
  • RFE: Developer: Add TcpSlaveAgentListener#getAdvertisedHost().

item.title: Jenkins 2.197
item.description: • Security: Security fixes.

item.title: Jenkins 2.196
item.description:
• RFE: Gzip compression when transferring artifacts being archived from agents to the master can now be disabled by setting the system property jenkins.model.StandardArtifactManager.disableTrafficCompression=true.
  • RFE: Make log rotation more robust.
  • Bug: Fix malformed XML in Atom and RSS 2.0 feeds. (regression in 2.194)
  • Bug: URLs of some projects with emojis in their name were inaccessible.

item.title: Jenkins 2.195
item.description: • Bug: The setup wizard sometimes was removed improperly, and Jenkins would only show a blank screen.

item.title: Jenkins 2.194
item.description:
• Bug: Fix missing absolute URL in the RSS / Atom feeds. (regression in 2.190)
  • RFE: Update Remoting from 3.33 to 3.35 to allow inbound TCP agents to connect directly without querying Jenkins via HTTP for connection parameters first.
  • RFE: Update Windows Service Wrapper from 2.2.0 to 2.3.0 to pick up fixes and improvements.
  • RFE: Internal: Update dom4j library from Jenkins project fork to upstream release 2.1.1.
  • RFE: Internal: Replaced different base64 implementations with java.util.Base64.

item.title: Jenkins 2.193
item.description:
• Major Bug: Downgrade Remoting from 3.34 to 3.33 due to problems involving tunneled connections. (regression in 2.191)
  • Major Bug: Jenkins UI broke when a slow trigger administrative warning would be shown. (regression in 2.189).

item.title: Jenkins 2.192
item.description: • Security: Important security fixes.

item.title: Jenkins 2.191
item.description:
• RFE: Update Remoting from 3.33 to 3.34 to allow inbound TCP agents to connect directly without querying Jenkins via HTTP for connection parameters first.
  • RFE: Multiple minor code cleanups and internal fixes.
  • RFE: Internal: Update Mockito from 2.22.0 to 3.0.0.

item.title: Jenkins 2.190
item.description:
• Bug: Add support of emojis and other non-UTF-8 characters in job names. üéâ
  • Bug: RSS and Atom feeds did not contain all necessary metadata. (regression in 2.186)
  • RFE: Expose real environment variables from an agent on the UI.
  • RFE: Use SHA-256 instead of MD5 for generating crumbs/CSRF tokens.
  • RFE: Truncate long build names on the UI to prevent alignment issues.
  • RFE: Developer: AbstractItem#renameTo now checks #isNameEditable before renaming.

item.title: Jenkins 2.189
item.description:
• Bug: A file handle leak in $JENKINS_HOME/jobs/*/builds/permalinks could prevent jobs from being deleted on Windows. (regression in 2.185)
  • Bug: Remove extra whitespace output from /scriptText endpoint. (regression in 2.186)
  • Bug: The install-plugin CLI command allowed files that aren't plugins to be installed, potentially breaking some functionality.
  • RFE: Add a warning when cron trigger spends a long time in its execution.
  • RFE: Batch up plugin installations in setup wizard to improve performance.
  • RFE: Stop using the name argument in the install-plugin CLI command.
  • RFE: Update versions of some detached plugins. These are typically installed when upgrading Jenkins from much older releases, or when implied dependencies are not specified for manually managed plugins.
  • RFE: Internal: Add support running JMH benchmarks for Jenkins core.
  • RFE: Internal: Update Jenkins Test Harness from 2.49 to 2.54 to add support for JMH benchmarks.
  • RFE: Internal: Omit WEB-INF/lib/jquery-detached-1.2.jar from jenkins.war.

item.title: Jenkins 2.188
Jenkins 2.187
item.description:
• RFE: The default interval for node monitors (e.g. free disk space) can now be changed by setting the system property hudson.node_monitors.AbstractNodeMonitorDescriptor.periodMinutes.
  • RFE: Robustness: Do not fail to render views when AdministrativeMonitor#isActivated fails.
  • RFE: Internal: Update slf4j version from 1.7.25 to 1.7.26.

item.title: Jenkins 2.186
item.description:
• Security: Important security fixes.
  • Major Bug: Remove Trilead SSH dependencies from the Jenkins core. These dependencies caused SSH build agent connection issues in 2.185.
  • RFE: Upgrade SSH CLI Auth Module from 1.5 to 1.7 to remove Trilead SSH references.

item.title: Jenkins 2.185
item.description:
• Major RFE: Jenkins no longer creates symbolic links inside project or build directories. The Build Symlink plugin may be installed to restore this functionality if desired. URLs such as /job/‚Ä¶/lastStableBuild/ are not affected, only tools which directly access the $JENKINS_HOME filesystem.
  • Major RFE: Remove Trilead SSH library from Jenkins core and make it available in a new detached plugin.
  • Bug: Do not throw exception when testing proxy configuration. (regression in 2.168)
  • Bug: Prevent occasional IllegalStateException on Jenkins restart and invalidate the user session.
  • Bug: Avoid duplicate screenResolution cookie for views.
  • Bug: Due to a mixture of old and new ‚Äúdetached‚Äù plugins, under certain circumstances it was possible to have two versions of an extension point used by the command launcher option for agents.
  • RFE: Add a warning to the Installed tab of the plugin manager alerting administrators to possible problems from disabling detached plugins, which became possible as of 2.181.
  • RFE: Remove unnecessary delay during cloud agent provisioning if the agent is available very quickly.
  • RFE: Update commons-codec library from 1.9 to 1.12.
  • Bug: Developer: Plugin Compatibility Tester did not skip bundled plugin installation even if a *.jpl file exists.

item.title: Jenkins 2.184
item.description:
• RFE: Remove obsolete session cookies when logging out, preventing errors related to headers being too large.
  • RFE: Add telemetry trial related to missing classes when running on Java 11.
  • Bug: Fix performance issue when using "Remember me". (regression in 2.160)
  • RFE: Developer: Clean up constructors of AbstractCloudSlave.

item.title: Jenkins 2.183
item.description:
• RFE: Add support for IPv6 addresses in the Jenkins URL configuration.
  • RFE: Update args4j from 2.0.31 to 2.33.
  • RFE: Developer: Allow plugins to provide onBlur() handlers for CodeMirror textarea controls.
  • RFE: Developer: Make WindowsUtil available to plugins.
  • RFE: Internal: update maven-war-plugin from 3.0.0 to 3.2.3.

item.title: Jenkins 2.182
item.description:
• Bug: When deleting directories, remove the read-only flag on Windows.
  • RFE: Update Remoting from 3.29 to 3.33.

item.title: Jenkins 2.181
item.description:
• Bug: The plugin manager UI no longer prevents disabling a plugin when other plugins only have optional dependencies to it.
  • Bug: A thread pool used to wait for external processes to complete could leak class loaders.
  • RFE: Robustness: Exceptions thrown while scheduling jobs in the queue could prevent other jobs from being scheduled.
  • RFE: Replace some exception stack traces related to agent channels with simpler messages.
  • RFE: Update JNA from 4.5.2 to 5.3.1 to fix issue with shared library loading on AIX when using OpenJDK.
  • RFE: Developer: Update ant dependency from 1.9.2 to 1.9.14.
  • RFE: Internal: Switch from FindBugs to SpotBugs for static analysis.
  • RFE: Internal: Mark hudson.model.UpdateSite#isDue as synchronized.

item.title: Jenkins 2.180
item.description:
• Major Bug: Remoting reverted to 3.29 because JNLP agents failed to connect cloud agents in certain situations. (regression in 2.176)
  • RFE: Improve Configuration-as-Code compatibility of ListView.

item.title: Jenkins 2.179
item.description:
• RFE: Detached plugin handling changes in 2.178 could cause problems for some custom Jenkins home packaging schemes that use improper filenames. These cases are now at least warned about, and in some cases transparently handled.
  • RFE: Change the presentation of boolean (checkbox) options for most options on configuration forms.
  • RFE: Developer: Make the XMLUtils class with utility methods related to safe XML processing available to plugins.

item.title: Jenkins 2.178
item.description:
• Bug: Update jmDNS from 3.4.0-jenkins-3 to 3.5.5 to prevent unnecessary DNS Multicast error messages.
  • Bug: Update WinP from 1.27 to 1.28 to fix problems with a missing DLL and flickering console window in the Windows graceful process shutdown logic.
  • Bug: Make sure detached plugins (plugins whose functionality used to be part of Jenkins itself) are installed upon Jenkins startup when needed as implied dependencies of other plugins which were already present. This simplifies compatibility for specialized installation scenarios not using the update center, such as when Jenkins is run from a Docker image prepackaged with some plugins.
  • RFE: Bring the bundled version of the Script Security plugin up to date with recent security advisories, in the unlikely case it is indeed installed from the WAR rather than the update center.

item.title: Jenkins 2.177
item.description:
• RFE: Support setting excludes and case sensitivity in the fingerprint() build step in Pipeline and other job types.
  • RFE: Allow distinguishing between new projects, disabled projects, and those with aborted builds through differently shaded build balls.
  • RFE: Update Windows Agent Installer from 1.10.0 to 1.11, enabling TLS 1.2 on agent downloads when running with .NET 4.6 or newer.
  • RFE: Update Winstone-Jetty from 5.2 to 5.3 to update Jetty to 9.4.18.
  • Bug: Restore Chinese localized resources used by the setup wizard. (regression in 2.176)
  • Bug: Robustness: Do not put agent offline for runtime exceptions in ComputerListener#onOnline().
  • Bug: Do not record fingerprints for files not included in archived artifacts due to exclude filter.
  • RFE: Developer: Make UserSeedProperty available to plugin developers.
  • RFE: Developer: Add support for titleClassMethod (from symbol-hetero-list in Pipeline) to f:hetero-list.

item.title: Jenkins 2.176
item.description:
• Major RFE: Some plugins would fail in 2.175 with an error related to serialization of FilePaths. This is now downgraded to a warning. Plugin updates should still be applied to correct the underlying mistake.
  • RFE: Add stop-job CLI command which allows aborting builds.
  • RFE: Update Remoting from 3.29 to 3.30 to fix a few minor issues.
  • RFE: Migrate all Chinese localization resources into Localization: Chinese (Simplified) plugin.
  • Bug: NodeListener#onCreated was called when Jenkins#addNode or Nodes#addNode actually replaced an existing node.
  • RFE: Developer: include generated source files of CLI module in the classpath.

item.title: Jenkins 2.175
item.description:
• RFE: Update status icon of a build when the build is finished
  • RFE: The Plugin Manager now provides easier selection for applicable plugin updates with options to select "All", "Compatible" or "None". The selection of "Compatible" plugins (previously "All") has been fixed to exclude all that contain any compatibility warnings.
  • RFE: Remove misleading references to Java Web Start and JNLP from GUI surrounding inbound Jenkins agents.
  • RFE: Re-enable Stapler request dispatching telemetry.
  • RFE: Ensure that Remoting objects are being serialized only through Remoting channels. Certain classes which were never designed for persistence in XML will no longer be serialized to disk: FilePath, [Stream]TaskListener, and ProcessTree.
  • Bug: Fix some errors seen in the Linux agent installers.
  • Bug: Make Debian/Ubuntu launcher script work with Java 11.
  • RFE: Developer: Make ${port} be honored by mvn -f war hudson-dev:run.

item.title: Jenkins 2.174
item.description:
• Bug: Renaming an agent retained old agent configuration, causing it to re-appear on restart.
  • RFE: Nested views are now searchable by name.

item.title: Jenkins 2.173
item.description:
• Major RFE: Remove built-in support for CCtray (cc.xml) files. To restore this feature, install the CCtray XML Plugin.
  • RFE: Adjust stream flushing behavior for code running remotely on agents for better performance. This may lead to loss of messages for plugins which print to a build log from the agent machine but do not flush their output. Use -Dhudson.util.StreamTaskListener.AUTO_FLUSH=true to restore the previous behavior for freestyle builds. Note that Pipeline builds always expect remote flush.
  • RFE: Add a button to copy new API tokens to the clipboard.
  • Bug: Make form submit buttons on the Jenkins classic UI compatible with potentially upcoming Firefox bug fix.
  • Bug: Do not offer a workspace lease to a new build if it is already in use by a (Pipeline) build running across an agent reconnection.
  • Bug: Remove Mailer related localized strings from core. Make sure you use Mailer Plugin 1.23.
  • Bug: Properly flush output from the Maven console annotator.
  • RFE: Developer: Update Stapler from 1.256 to 1.257 to add support for loading localized webapp resources from any plugin. Add jenkins.PluginLocaleDrivenResourceProvider interface for plugins to participate in localized resource lookup.
  • RFE: Developer: SystemProperties may now be used from agent-side code. See SystemProperties#allowOnAgent.
  • RFE: Developer: Add LineTransformationOutputStream#Delegating for convenience.
  • RFE: Developer: hudson.util.ssh.SFTPClient was removed. Use com.trilead.ssh2.jenkins.SFTPClient from the Trilead SSH library instead.
  • RFE: Internal: Update commons-beanutils from 1.8.3 to 1.9.3.

item.title: Jenkins 2.172
item.description: • Security: Security fixes.

item.title: Jenkins 2.171
item.description:
• RFE: Expose the minimum supported version of remoting to allow future releases to reject incompatible agent connections.
  • Bug: The setup wizard did not properly escape passwords, resulting in errors with certain special characters.
  • Bug: Revert accidental change to hashCode computation of jenkins.util.TreeString in 2.168.
  • RFE: Developer: Add Jelly UI component f:secretTextarea for multi-line secrets analogous to f:password for single-line.
  • RFE: Developer: Deprecated Run.getLogFile(), as it is not compatible with JEP-210.
